title: Set initial COMMON zero-fee threshold
description: The very first governance vote: what COMMON token balance should unlock zero auction fees? Proposed value: 3,000 COMMON â€” roughly the full airdrop allocation of one Commoner NFT. Too low and the treasury never fills. Too high and nobody can reach it. The community decides.

title: Commission 3 artists for March bounties
description: Allocate 1.5 SOL from the treasury to commission three human artists to create bounty artwork for the first week of March auctions. Artists to be selected by community nomination in Discord.

title: Require 100 COMMON to list an auction
description: Set a minimum COMMON token balance of 100 as a requirement for any wallet to list a MidEvil in the daily auction. Intended to filter for committed community members.
